replies.body: I can just hear Ezreal in the last picture yelling, "YOU BELONG IN A MUSEUM!"{{champion:81}}
LOL Yeah. Vladimir: Man... why does it have to be the history museum ...? ezreal: Shut up you belong in a museum!
this comment literally has me in tears

having scissors attached to his cape would be hilarious

I love ~~her~~ his drawing style. The comic is really nicely done.
Thanks for sharing Gutter Rat's work with us!
Grouch is a dude

> [{quoted}](name=A Terrible Talon,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=yA8iKpaG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-14T23:13:47.850+0000)
>
> Grouch is a dude

The News page says:

> Gutter Rat brings **her** hilariously adorable artistry to the Academy universe for a comics collab!

EDIT: Riot changed the News page to "their," just like on the Boards page.

Yup! I am a dude my bub.
But thank you!! <3
Love your works from tumblr. Keep it up! So glad you got the community spotlight :3
Where in the world is Headmistress Fiora
Sipping coffee with the museum curator.
{{champion:51}} did someone say tea ?
No, they said coffee.
{{champion:51}} Sigh... Demacians. No class at all. Wouldn't you say, Vi?
{{champion:254}} I like coffee. And donuts. And punching stuff.
{{champion:51}} My point exactly. Carry on
{{champion:222}} Class? HAHAHAHA *explosion in the background* Who needs class when it's sooo BORRRING?!
The folowing Caitlyn-Vi chatter deserves to be in a Meme-Mausoleum.
You're going to be massively disappointed if you think you're actually going to get these every week. Artists and content creators tend to be wildly inconsistent.
You got another thing coming my guy ;D
Are you taking any art classes at the moment? I briefly skimmed your page linked above, and you do some fantastic work. If you're self taught then you're amazing!

Oh no I don't take any classes haha. I'm a self-taught artist! I spend almost everyday drawing and trying to improve. My undying love for League fan art has driven me a lot as well.  
But thank you so much! :'D
I love it all. I need more Talon/Darius bro moments.

ofc the ezreal is the only one that gets caught 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
See {{champion:29}} down there?

If the artist is present great job! If you don't mind my 2 cents I think in the first panel you should color the bubble to specify who's talking since its hard to tell, also if you drew a close up of the Z-Drive when Ahri knocks it between the 3rd and 4th panel it'd be perfect!

Keep it up!

Oh wow thank you! 
This is actually super helpful in terms of critique! Unfortunately, nothing can be done now, but I'll keep this in mind for future pages.
I didn't relise ekko was black until now
...That's quite a long time to realize that, did it take twice as long to figure out Lucian was black too?{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

*Razzle Dazzel*

{{champion:48}} Hahaha! Great job kid. You've really done this academy proud.

{{champion:44}} Hehe...thanks coach, but it's really nothin.

{{champion:13}} Don't belittle yourself Taric, you've done excellent in all of your studies and extracurriculars. Far more so than the other students, so the least you could afford is to allow this little praise from your overly proud teachers.

{{champion:53}} Affirmative, Student Taric is amply qualified to receive at minimum, staff and student acclamation.

{{champion:114}} It is true, there seems to be no one in this academy that could be a worthy opponent to him in popularity or academics.

{{champion:44}} Aww...teach you think to highly of me.

{{champion:103}} *Glares Menacingly*
